      • getOrCreateChildGroupById

        public org.w3c.dom.Element getOrCreateChildGroupById(org.w3c.dom.Element parent,
                                                     java.lang.String id)
        Gets or create a child group (g tag) of the given parent with a given id. If an element with this id exists and is no group, return null.
        Parameters:
        parent - parent element
        id - child id
        Returns:
        new or existing group, null if the element is found but is no group

      • createLabel

        public org.w3c.dom.Element createLabel(java.lang.String text,
                                       Point pos,
                                       java.lang.String id,
                                       java.lang.String cssClass)
        Creates a textual label and place it in the svg document previous the viewbox.
        Parameters:
        text - | the textual value that should be diplayed
        pos - | pixel position in the svg file where the text should start
        id - | XML id of the node
        cssClass - | css class for this node
        Returns:
        an textual Element already placed in the svg file with given text at given position.
